pkgmetadata.longdescription: Estimation for Scale-Shape Mixtures of Skew-Normal Distributions // Provide data generation and estimation tools for the multivariate scale mixtures of normal presented in Lange and Sinsheimer (1993) doi:10.2307/1390698, the multivariate scale mixtures of skew-normal presented in Zeller, Lachos and Vilca (2011) doi:10.1080/02664760903406504, the multivariate skew scale mixtures of normal presented in Louredo, Zeller and Ferreira (2021) doi:10.1007/s13571-021-00257-y and the multivariate scale mixtures of skew-normal-Cauchy presented in Kahrari et al. (2020) doi:10.1080/03610918.2020.1804582.
